|brand = ASUS |model = RT-ACRH15 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = August 23, 2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/ASUS_RT-ACRH15 |wlclass = AC1500 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTACRH01 |icid = 3568A-RTACRH01 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = S418015A |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN5502;QUALCOMM, QCN5502, 000, PK9026KY; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = v5.0<!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 775 <!-- 775 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = SPI |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W971GG6SB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337;QCA8337-AL3C, PK8142QF, 1814, TAIWAN; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 5GHz WLAN FEM;Qorvo;QFP4501;45F1, 7672, 61747;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.50.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS, ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS_5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SGE (T&W) |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/23/2019 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 750, 900, 1000 --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9888; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :"S418015A_02" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
Additional models covered by this FCC certification include: * [[ASUS RT-AC59U]] • (ASUS RT-ACRH15) :* [[ASUS RT-AC1500G+]] (GP/PLUS) :* [[ASUS RT-AC1500UHP]] * [[ASUS RT-AC58U]] (B1 ?) • ([[ASUS RT-ACRH13]]) :* [[ASUS RT-AC1300G+]] (GP/PLUS) (B1 ?) :* [[ASUS RT-AC1200GE]] * [[ASUS RT-AC57U]] (B1 ?)
"All models are electrically identical, different model names are for marketing purpose"
* Web GUI: http://router.asus.com
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== '''ASUS RT-AC1500UHP''' {{OpenWrtNotice|development}} {{OpenWrtNotice|prebuilt}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-ac1500uhp |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ath79 |subtarget = generic |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = snapshot |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = [https://openwrt.org/unsupported/wifi_2.4ghz WiFi 2.4GHz] |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
